experiences.company: USC Information Sciences Institute - Humans Lab
description: Contributed to the development of a web scraper using Selenium for automation of data extraction from social media platforms.
Developed ETL data pipelines for time-series analysis, leveraging ARIMA, Prophet and LSTM models to forecast website traffic.
Conducted benchmarking analysis using metrics such as MSE, MAPE, AIC, and BIC to achieve targeted increases in hits.
Employed BERT, topic modeling, and sentiment analysis to develop NLP pipeline for determining gender-based interest in text.
Reduced time from 3 hours to 2 minutes by independently designing Generative AI client discovery tool using GPT-3.5 LLM.
Transformed client interactions by pioneering prompt engineering for data extraction and client profile visualization interface.
Achieved 99% increase in efficiency by streamlining data management for 950+ accounts using Python in a cross-functional team.
Offered data-driven insights to 250+ clients by instituting Financial Health Checker that leveraged Python for predictive analytics.
Produced a gain of 30% in accuracy by back-testing and spearheading overhaul of forecasting strategies such Moving Averages.
Led a team of 5 that procured 88/100 for development of a scalable Virtual Workspace for 25+ WFH employees.
Instituted a 10% boost in productivity by leveraging Django's REST API to enable remote team communication.
